This multi-purpose facial polish can be used in a number of ways:

As a Blackhead Remover for Sensitive Skin Cleanse and massage your face with cleansing oil for 1 minute. Gently massage Black Sugar Scrub on the nose in a circular motion for 30 seconds, and rinse thoroughly with tepid water. Do a secondary cleansing with fine bubble cleanser. Apply your usual toner, serum and moisturiser from your skincare routine.

As a Facial Exfoliator for all Skin Types Mix a few drops of cleansing oil and Black Sugar Scrub. After cleansing spread a layer of the product on face, avoiding eyes and mouth. Gently scrub and then apply another thin layer. Wait 5-15 minutes and then rinse off. Follow with toner, serum, and moisturizer for best results.

Your 15-second masking experience: Apply a capful of splash mask on the face, avoiding the eye and lip area. Then use the water from the shower to splash and rinse off the face. Repeat a few times. After a shower, follow with usual skincare steps.

Another method of use is to pour a capful of splash mask into a clean bowl of water (the ideal ratio of formula to water is 1:100, so a capful requires 700ml of water). Stir with fingertips, then use to splash generously onto face. Gently pat face until damp, not wet afterward.

RECOMMENDATIONS:

Use in the evening. Always use SPF protection during the day. Do not use together with other acids like AHAs, BHAs, and retinol. When using first time, do a patch test on your wrist on behind the ear. Mild irritation or redness may occur for first time users. If so, use every other night until skin adjusts. Contents may darken due to retinol properties. Note this is a natural phenomenon that does not affect the potency of the product. Store in a cool, dark space between 15ºC ~ 25ºC, as far away from light and heat as possible. Use within 3 months of opening. Do not use on open wounds or scratched skin.

Use in the evening. Always use SPF protection during the day. Do not use together with other acids like AHAs, BHAs, and retinol. When using first time, do a patch test on your wrist on behind the ear. Mild irritation or redness may occur for first time users. If so, use every other night until skin adjusts. Contents may darken due to retinol properties. Note this is a natural phenomenon that does not affect the potency of the product. Store in a cool, dark space between 15ºC ~ 25ºC, as far away from light and heat as possible. Use within 3 months of opening. Do not use on open wounds or scratched skin.

Step 1: Take an appropriate amount of the All Day Vitamin Clean & Mild Facial Cleanser and rub it in between your palms to create a lather. Then gently massage the lather into your skin. Rinse off with lukewarm water.

Step 2: Follow up with your favourite toner. On exfoliation days, soak a cotton pad with the Yes I’m Toner AHA 5% and gently wipe it across your face.

Step 3: Take a few drops of the All Day Vitamin Brightening & Balancing Facial Serum and gently massage it into your skin. Pat in any excess serum on your face to improve absorption of the product. Note: we do not recommend mixing the toner with the serum as both have brightening and exfoliating properties.

Step 4: Finally, take an appropriate amount of the Have a Good Cream Snail & Centella and apply it evenly across your skin to lock in all the moisture. In the morning, follow up with your favourite sunscreen.

We recommend doing a patch test on a wrist or behind the ear before using any new product.

Caution In Use:

1. In case of having side effects such as red rash, swollen and/or itching while using this product, or in case such symptoms appear by direct sunlight or after using it, consult a dermatologist immediately.
